original_text: The man had only one person that he could still send. This was his own son. The man loved him very much. So, last of all, he sent his son to the farmers. He thought, “The farmers will surely respect my son.”
korean_text: 이제 한 사람이 남았으니 곧 그가 사랑하는 아들이라 최후로 이를 보내며 이르되 내 아들은 존대하리라 하였더니

sentences.original_text: The man had only one person
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 단 한 명만 가지고 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: The man loved him very much
he sent his son to the farmers
The farmers will surely respect my son
sentences.korean_translation: 농부들은 분명 내 아들을 존중할 것이다
